title: Use LED Lights
description: Replace traditional bulbs with LED lights to save electricity.

title: Clay Diyas
description: Use traditional clay diyas instead of plastic decorative lights.
ecoReason: Clay diyas are biodegradable and reusable.

title: Natural Rangoli Colors
description: Make your own rangoli colors from turmeric, rice flour, and flowers.
ecoReason: Chemical-free and safe for kids and pets.

title: Reusable Gift Wraps
description: Use cloth bags or old newspaper instead of plastic wraps.
ecoReason: Reduces plastic waste and saves cost.

title: Solar Garden Lights
description: Install solar garden lights for outdoor decoration.
ecoReason: Saves electricity and works on renewable energy.

title: Community Fireworks
description: Celebrate with a shared community fireworks show instead of individual bursting.
ecoReason: Reduces air and noise pollution drastically.

title: Eco-Friendly Torans
description: Decorate doors with handmade torans from leaves, flowers, and paper.
ecoReason: Avoids plastic d√©cor and promotes biodegradable materials.

title: Digital Greeting Cards
description: Send digital greetings instead of printed cards.
ecoReason: Saves paper and reduces carbon footprint from printing.
